eegdash.dataset.NM000107
========================

FRL Wrist Control: Wrist Movement Decoding from Surface Electromyography (OpenNeuro ``nm000107``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: emg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 1` :bdg-light:`License: CC-BY-NC 4.0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 100` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 182` :bdg-light:`Source: nemar`

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import NM000107

   dataset = NM000107(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = NM000107(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = NM000107(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
